body_html: Doesn't recomputing the weights on every forward mean that you are going to use O(N^2s) space instead of O(N^2 + Ns) space, where N is the number of neurons and s is the number of BPTT steps you do?
body_text: Doesn't recomputing the weights on every forward mean that you are going to use O(N^2s) space instead of O(N^2 + Ns) space, where N is the number of neurons and s is the number of BPTT steps you do?
body: Doesn't recomputing the weights on every ``forward`` mean that you are going to use O(N^2s) space instead of O(N^2 + Ns) space, where N is the number of neurons and s is the number of BPTT steps you do?
